asset.author: Bed Bath & Beyond
asset.hookText:
http://www.bedbathandbeyond.com/store/product/upstairs-dransfield-ross-madrigal-duvet-cover/210381?Keyword=madrigal
Inspired by the culture of Morocco, the Madrigal duvet cover showcases a subtle printed ikat design in sea glass blue, abalone, and natural, and is embellished by embroidered accents for a truly sophisticated and worldly look. Thanks for watching. Make sure to subscribe to the Bed Bath & Beyond YouTube Channel.

transcripts: We would like to tell you about our distinctive vision for a bed bath and beyond with a new collection up stairs. The visual dynamic of Moroccan culture was our inspiration for the magical padding and accessories. The magical duvet cover and shams or embellish with an application more border design they are accented with a subtle Cath design in towns of sea glass blue abalone and natural cordoning sheets are locks 300 thread count Jacques card with embroider to catch. Our coverlet features a quilted medallion design which relates back to the dubious border the bed skirt features three individual cat printed panels anchoring pens are included. Beautiful decorative pillows have a sophisticated but theatrical impact to the magical fabric the magical betting and accessories are part of our collection up stairs transfield and Ross. We invite you to see our new bedding designs at select bed bath and beyond stores and online.
